description: {"blocks":[{"key":"estvr","text":"This protocol describes the procedure for hippocampal neuronal cultures from new - born mouse pups.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
